name: End of space: a FAE one-shot
name_original: End of space: a FAE one-shot
description:
«You are a crew of humans that trained together for 3 years to test out a new spaceship in the prototype phase capable of traveling quickly in our solar system. There is a sudden anomaly close to Jupiter that pushes your crew to leave earlier than planned investigate…»

A one-shot horror-survival space adventure inspired by the stories of H.P Lovecraft and the video game Deadspace. Powered by the Fate Accelerated Edition system by Evil Hat productions.
